thumb.title: [TAS] N64 星のカービィ64: The Crystal Shards "all shards" by NiaHoshino in 1:03:27.00 1/2
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HumeFfrO_uwpart2→sm44802676以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6454M TAS originally published on 2025-03-24Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards is a 2.5 dimensional side-scrolling adventure game featuring Kirby, our little pink hero. This time around, it's up to Kirby to collect the seventy-four crystal shards and save the fairies' home, Ripple Star. NiaHoshino (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/NiaHoshino ) collects all shards while improving over the previous publication ( https://tasvideos.org/1970M ) by over 02:48.62.
thumb.last_res_body: 小魚の挙動凝ってんな リフトアップいいよね 波で濡れてますよ ほおばったままい... ダメージで高度リ... これがTASカービィ... カッターカッター... 中ボスで跳ね返る...
